thread.title: Tokyo Game Show 2015: Console Needs More 3rd Party Support, Mobile Has Peaked
thread.title_full: Tokyo Game Show 2015: Console Needs More 3rd Party Support, Mobile Has Peaked

title: Tokyo Game Show 2015: Console Needs More 3rd Party Support, Mobile Has Peaked
text: Tokyo Game Show 2015: Console Needs More 3rd Party Support, Mobile Has Peaked Sunday, 20 September 2015 (25 minutes ago) One of the signs in gaming before the floor falls out from beneath you is that of wanton excess. This yearâ€™s Tokyo Game Show had that in abundance, not from console publishers mind but the mobile gaming contingent. Yet in Japan, many feel the market has peaked so the excess was very telling.
